data.text: Mtowe luchenze kwa chiwalo cha Mkulu Nguluwi hemwe watanganiche.
Mumtogole Mkulu Nguluwi kwa igombogombo,
Mmwimbile lwimbo lunyale,
kwa vila ulonzi wa Mkulu Nguluwi ugoloka,
Mkulu Nguluwi kangugana kutanganika na hachi,
Kwa ulonzi wa Mkulu Nguluwi ulanga naulumbigwa,
Nakakungajiza mazi ga bahali kota kuli ibuli,
Isi yeng'ha imdumbe Mkulu Nguluwi.
Kwa vila nakalonga na isi naiwa,
Mkulu Nguluwi kangutengulaga kunuwila kwa wanhu wa isi,
Choyogana kudita Mkulu Nguluwi changikala mazuwa gose,
Nawatambichizwa wanhu wa isi wawele Nguluwi wa hewo ndo Mkulu Nguluwi,
Mkulu Nguluwi kangulolaga hasi kulawa kilanga,
Kulawa kuli chigoda cha heye cha undewa,
Heye kangulumbaga nhumbula za wanhu weng'ha,
Mndewa halinguloholigwa kwa chilundo chikulu cha wamizi,
Falasi wa ngondo hawele chinhu kwa kusumya,
Mkulu Nguluwi kanguwalola wala walingumdumba,
Heye kanguwaloholaga kulawa kuli kubagama,
Nhumbula za hetwe zangitumbila kwa Mkulu Nguluwi.
Ena twangusangalala kwa chiwalo cha heye,
Igano lya hegwe lya kwimilila likale na hetwe, gwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
